name: Nick Promises this is not a Paid Endorsement
name_original: Nick Promises this is not a Paid Endorsement
description:
Buckle up for the most intense merchandizing action you've ever experienced. Nick Promises this is not a Paid Endorsement is the world's first ever First-Person-Shirting game. Grab your T-Shirt cannon and SELL SELL SELL. Make sure every evil Blandoid looks stylin' in your Brand! brand clothing.

Created for Wizard Jam 9

Everything by Nick Kornek
